fehd.ADR_EN: G/F, 4-B HANG HAU VILLAGE, TSEUNG KWAN O, SAI KUNG, NEW TERRITORIES
fehd.ADR_TC: 新界西貢 將軍澳坑口村4號B地下

reviews.text: Great steak as always!  Def worthgoing all the way there if you arecraving for a nice steak!

Excellent steak house in relaxed area. It’s not easy to reach Hang Hau Village. However you can get to Lardos Steak House once you reached there. It’s close to the entrance of the village.
Steak there is nice. Juicy and smell good. You gotta try Tomahawk Prime as it their signature menu!
Great steak and service. Only downer is when there is a kids birthday party there. Ruins the evening. Please lardos when people make bookings please tell them If there is a kids party

2 years ago, I went tom the cheapest highly rated HK steak place near Kowloon Clear Water Bay.

I ordered their 360HKD, top USA grade rib eye & the 90 lunch special. Oddly the lunch special ribeye was superior to the USDA top grade steak.

Live and learn.

Today, I went for the 2nmd time to a steakplace & butcher near IAPM, I was abit paranoid that last weeks NY Steak- 112RMB half price, that I was given an inferior cut.

This week the same waiter greeted me. And told me whatever U lorder today I get an 1/2 off coupon even if it is a day special.

I adjusted cheaper my order to the cheapest Aussie 500grams Chateaubriand for 298rmb + 149 rmb voucher.

When I got it, I was astonished that it was a steak-kije I had maybe 20years ago in SanFrancisco.

Only w/salt &  pepper, the taste & quality was worth it.

Making me realize that 2years ago, I was ripped off at that HK steak restaurant.
Quality of the steak is great but cooking is just average. Great value thought.
Great steak as always!  Def worthgoing all the way there if you arecraving for a nice steak!

Great steak as always!  Def worthgoing all the way there if you arecraving for a nice steak!
一間尚算不錯的村屋地鋪食肆。價位偏高，但比較方便，位於村口小巴站。
斧頭扒幾好味！
